title: Development of Accessible E-Learning Language Education Content

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical VR device-based educational environment requiring personalized approaches considering diverse learning ability levels

learning_goals: Learners can explain e-learning content design principles that consider various types of disabilities with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can create language learning modules incorporating accessibility features using simulation tools.
Learners can apply and evaluate at least three core accessibility elements—such as color contrast, text-to-speech—in VR environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
